errors.429: Too many requests. Try again later

lock_delay_settings.subtitle: If you won’t open Charon extension at least once within chosen period, we’ll lock Charon until you’ll log in with your password again.

user_menu_page.delete_hint:
We’ll clean all the cookies and other information connected with your account.
You’ll be able to recover your account with seed phrase.

delete_confirmation.content: You’ll lose your account information, PDV rate, and cookies and won't be able to restore it. The only thing you can restore with the seed phrase is the account name.
delete_confirmation.title: Delete your account?

user_menu_page.lock_hint: You’ll be able to unlock your account using your password.
user_menu_page.restore_seed_hint: Restore seed phrase using your password
